title: Science Competency Enhancement for Adult Practitioners Using a Hybrid Remote Education Model

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theories and practical experience
context.additional_context: Providing a flexible learning environment for current practitioners to balance work and study

learning_goals: Learners can engage in real-time collaboration with peers and instructors using video conferencing tools (Zoom, Microsoft Teams, etc.) in hybrid environments.
Learners can apply skills in collecting and analyzing experimental data using digital devices in practical settings.
Learners understand science theories by topic at over 85% proficiency while engaging with asynchronous learning materials and real-time classes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
